text: Saint-Léger-de-Linières is a commune in the Maine-et-Loire department in western France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Saint-Léger-des-Bois (the seat) and Saint-Jean-de-Linières.Arrêté préfectoral 20 September 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Maine-et-Loire department ==References== * INSEE commune file Saintlegerdelinieres
title: Saint-Léger-de-Linières
